text: == Events == * July 16 — Year one of the Islamic calendar begins. * September – Hijra (Islam) (Mohammad leave Mecca and go to Medina.) * Xuanzang is fully ordained as a monk at the age of 20. * The first Chinese Encyclopedia, Yiwen Leiju, is completed. == Births == * Xue Yuanchao == Deaths == * Prince Shotoku, Japanese prince, one of the first in that country to support Buddhism * Andronicus, Coptic Orthodox Patriarch of Alexandria * Li Zitong * Lin Shihong * Liu Wuzhou
